snippet.title: Clearinghouse on Male Circumcision for HIV Prevention
snippet.description: The report's update on the progress of voluntary medical male circumcision (PDF, 68 KB) programmes in 16 countries shows that the cumulative number of men circumcised through 14 of these programmes doubled in 2012.
